document_data.name: Argath
document_data.mainbody: '''Argath''' was a member of the [[Cult of the Howling Hatred]].{{Cite adventurers league/Eye of the Tempest|24}}
document_data.History: Argath was originally a scoundrel from a settlement near [[Silverymoon]]. After being banished from his home, he joined the Howling Hatred. In [[1491 DR]], he acted as the cult's liaison and the supervisor of the [[bugbear]] chieftain [[Hrar]], in [[Damara]] near the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]]. Eventually, an adventuring party hired for a mission at the monastery were convinced by sergeant [[Sergor]] to fight Hrar and his minions, and Argath also was killed.
